document.discussion_title: League One | Charlton sign NI striker Magennis
document.topic_text: Charlton sign NI striker Magennis League One Charlton Athletic have confirmed the signing of Northern Ireland international striker Josh Magennis from Kilmarnock for an undisclosed fee. The 25-year-old becomes the Addicks' eighth signing of the summer and has put pen-to-paper on a two-year deal.
document.post: Charlton sign NI striker Magennis League One Charlton Athletic have confirmed the signing of Northern Ireland international striker Josh Magennis from Kilmarnock for an undisclosed fee.
